name: Queers in Love at the End of the World
name_original: Queers in Love at the End of the World
description:
Queers in Love at the End of the World is a game developed by anna anthropy. It came out on 12-03-2016. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Queers in Love at the End of the World on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
